services.name: nail clipping
services.description: Quick nail trimming and filing, preventing overgrowth, splitting, and discomfort

services.name: Ear cleaning
services.description: Remove wax and debris, help prevent infections and odor, and keep your dog’s ears healthy and comfortable.

services.name: Hair detangling
services.description: Remove mats and knots. Keeps your dog’s coat smooth, healthy, and easy to maintain.

services.name: Teeth brushing
services.description: Remove plaque and buildup and help prevent bad breath and dental issues.

services.name: Basic grooming
services.description: Includes: nail clipping, ear cleaning, paw trimming, private part trimming, shampoo/conditioning and drying.

services.name: Full grooming
services.description: Includes everything provided in basic grooming PLUS hair trimming and styling.
